name: Preorder.continuous_restrictLe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
X : α → Type u_2
inst✝ : (i : α) → TopologicalSpace (X i)
a : α
⊢ Continuous (Preorder.restrictLe a)
decl:
@[continuity, fun_prop]
theorem continuous_restrictLe (a : α) : Continuous (restrictLe (π := X) a) :=
  Pi.continuous_restrict _

name: Preorder.continuous_restrictLe₂
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : Preorder α
X : α → Type u_2
inst✝ : (i : α) → TopologicalSpace (X i)
a b : α
hab : LE.le a b
⊢ Continuous (Preorder.restrictLe₂ hab)
decl:
@[continuity, fun_prop]
theorem continuous_restrictLe₂ {a b : α} (hab : a ≤ b) : Continuous (restrictLe₂ (π := X) hab) :=
  Pi.continuous_restrict₂ _

name: Preorder.continuous_frestrictLe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : Preorder α
X : α → Type u_2
inst✝¹ : (i : α) → TopologicalSpace (X i)
inst✝ : LocallyFiniteOrderBot α
a : α
⊢ Continuous (Preorder.frestrictLe a)
decl:
@[continuity, fun_prop]
theorem continuous_frestrictLe (a : α) : Continuous (frestrictLe (π := X) a) :=
  Finset.continuous_restrict _

name: Preorder.continuous_frestrictLe₂
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝² : Preorder α
X : α → Type u_2
inst✝¹ : (i : α) → TopologicalSpace (X i)
inst✝ : LocallyFiniteOrderBot α
a b : α
hab : LE.le a b
⊢ Continuous (Preorder.frestrictLe₂ hab)
decl:
@[continuity, fun_prop]
theorem continuous_frestrictLe₂ {a b : α} (hab : a ≤ b) :
    Continuous (frestrictLe₂ (π := X) hab) :=
  Finset.continuous_restrict₂ _
